MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L25 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Lee Park Avenue and surrounding  areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:39pm. Our emergency response team is currently on site carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible.We are aware of the interuptions to your power supply earlier on today and we apologise for the inconvenience. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored.This message was updated at 7:59pm on 28th April 2021
